name: Alone (itch) (Jonathan Matta)
description:
This game was made for the GMTK game jam 2021. Wohoooo yaaaay.  This is a puzzle platformer with my fantastic composing skills. The music is kinda decent i guess. But still if its  anoying you could mute it. I'll add a settings tab and more levels after the voting time is done.

I foun out that there was a bug when you use URP and WebGL in unity. So i decided to find out more but i did not have time so i hope i submit my game in time right now I am building the game without URP so it may look odd. I had lights to help the level design and make everything look good but I need to settle with UNITY'S PARTICLE SYSTEM.

I can't figure out how to fix this proplem because I cant run a WebGL thingy on itch. so there is a downloadable so i could submit something to the game jam right before the deadline. I did not have time to build and submit the game with the URP. (Honestly I did not want to sit and do the setup thing for URP  agan but now for more scenes I normally dont use prefabs so it woud take som time).

I really hope that this atleast works for now I'll fix it to work in the web.

The controls are:

Moving with A and D 

Jump with Space

Alternatively use arow keys and space

Left click to swich Character

To download:

1. Download the zip file.

2.Decompress the file.

3.Run Alone.exe

Enjoy!
